alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 2:33PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Southwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 233 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms repeatedly moving over the same areas. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in a short period of time. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Coden, Dixon Corner, Saint Elmo, Irvington, Kirewakra, Fowl River, Laurendine, South Orchard and Delchamps.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
